item.title: Configure Your PTCL SmartLink SIP Account On Freeswitch
item.description: Following up on my previous post on how to configure your PTCL Smart Link SIP account on asterisk, below is the configuration I used for PTCL â€“ Just replace USERNAME and PASSWORD with your credentials. You will also need to change your user agent , This can be done by adding the below parameter in sip_profiles/external.xml
